Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1972...
Traded from New York (N) to Philadelphia on 2/6/1972 (Going to PHI: LF D. Thomas. Going to NYM: C S. Butera)...
Injured on 6/9/1973 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 5/19/1975, off Bob L. Miller (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/24/1975, off Ted Davidson (HOU)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Cincinnati on 9/28/1979...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1979, hitting .398 with 2 HR, 21 RBI...
